description: Backend engineering and distributed systems fundamentals

nodes.name: Database Indexing
nodes.description: B-tree vs hash indexes, query planning, covering indexes, index selectivity
challenge_hooks: Why does a composite index on (a, b) not help a query filtering only on b?
What is a covering index and when does it eliminate a table lookup?
Why does adding an index slow down writes?

nodes.name: ACID & Transactions
nodes.description: Atomicity, consistency, isolation, durability; isolation levels; phantom reads; MVCC
challenge_hooks: What anomaly does the Repeatable Read isolation level prevent vs Read Committed?
How does MVCC allow reads without blocking writes?
When would you deliberately use a weaker isolation level?

nodes.name: Caching Strategies
nodes.description: Cache-aside, write-through, write-behind, TTL, cache invalidation, stampede
challenge_hooks: What is a cache stampede and how do you prevent it?
When would write-through caching cause problems?
Why is cache invalidation considered one of the hardest problems in CS?

nodes.name: API Design
nodes.description: REST principles, idempotency, HTTP methods, pagination, versioning, rate limiting
challenge_hooks: Why must PUT be idempotent but POST need not be?
What's the difference between cursor-based and offset-based pagination?
How would you version an API without breaking existing clients?

nodes.name: Distributed Systems
nodes.description: CAP theorem, consistency models, consensus (Raft/Paxos), replication, partitioning
challenge_hooks: State the CAP theorem and give an example of a CP vs AP system.
What does 'eventual consistency' guarantee and not guarantee?
How does Raft achieve leader election?

nodes.name: Concurrency Patterns
nodes.description: Thread pools, async I/O, connection pooling, backpressure, actor model
challenge_hooks: Why does async I/O outperform thread-per-request for I/O-bound workloads?
What is backpressure and how do you implement it?
When would you choose a thread pool over async/await?

nodes.name: Event-Driven Architecture
nodes.description: Message queues, pub/sub, event sourcing, CQRS, at-least-once vs exactly-once delivery
challenge_hooks: What is the difference between at-least-once and exactly-once delivery?
When would you use event sourcing over a traditional CRUD database?
How does CQRS separate read and write models?

nodes.name: Authentication & Authorization
nodes.description: JWT, OAuth2, sessions, RBAC, ABAC, token refresh, zero-trust
challenge_hooks: Why should JWT secrets be rotated and what happens when you do?
What's the difference between authentication and authorization?
Why are refresh tokens stored differently from access tokens?

nodes.name: Observability
nodes.description: Logs, metrics, traces â€” the three pillars; SLIs/SLOs/SLAs; structured logging
challenge_hooks: What is the difference between a metric, a log, and a trace?
How do distributed traces help debug latency in microservices?
What's the difference between an SLI and an SLO?

nodes.name: SQL & Query Planning
nodes.description: JOIN types, query planner, N+1 problem, EXPLAIN ANALYZE, window functions
challenge_hooks: What is the N+1 query problem and how do you fix it?
When does the query planner choose a sequential scan over an index scan?
What does a window function compute that GROUP BY cannot?
